x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/chargeitemdefinition-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/ChargeItemDefinition \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"ChargeItemDefinition","id":"8e3e0e4f-2c4e-4eb2-85b6-a7e5b4e4fe4b","url":"http://sap.org/ChargeItemDefinition/device-123","status":"active","description":"Financial details for  custom made device","instance":[{"reference":"Device/12345"}],"applicability":[{"description":"Verify ChargeItem pertains to Device 12345","language":"text/fhirpath","expression":"%context.service.suppliedItem='Device/12345'"}],"propertyGroup":[{"priceComponent":[{"type":"base","code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://fhir.de/CodeSystem/billing-attributes","code":"VK","display":"Verkaufspreis (netto)"}]},"amount":{"value":67.44,"currency":"EUR"}}]},{"applicability":[{"description":"Gültigkeit Steuersatz","language":"text/fhirpath","expression":"%context.occurenceDateTime > '2018-04-01'"}],"priceComponent":[{"type":"tax","code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://fhir.de/CodeSystem/billing-attributes","code":"MWST","display":"Mehrwersteuersatz"}]},"factor":1.19}]},{"applicability":[{"description":"Gültigkeit Steuersatz","language":"text/fhirpath","expression":"%context.occurenceDateTime <= '2018-04-01'"}],"priceComponent":[{"type":"tax","code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://fhir.de/CodeSystem/billing-attributes","code":"MWST","display":"Mehrwersteuersatz"}]},"factor":1.07}]}],"meta":{"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:14.857+08:00"}}'

javascript Axios

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the charge item definition

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the charge item definition

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the charge item definition

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The charge item definition publication date

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the charge item definition

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: The time during which the charge item definition is intended to be in use

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the charge item definition

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the charge item definition

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the charge item definition

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the charge item definition

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the charge item definition

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the charge item definition

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the charge item definition

resource.description: Financial details for  custom made device
